page.title: 10CONSERVATION: ST OUEN'S BAY
page.content:
The slopes behind L'Etacq Woodcrafts, the slopes to the south and west of the Dolmen des Monts Grantez as well as the coastal strips to the south of both Lewis Tower and Kempt Tower are designated conservation areas under Le Parcq des Mielles Development Plan.
In these areas the wildlife has priority so that whilst the local population and tourists can enjoy the open spaces nature conservation is the main aim in this area.
This is not easy to achieve because too many people trampling over the land would destroy some of the plants but some trampling is needed to maintain the herb rich flora and to allow access.
